section.title: Tracking of changes in response to the 3rd Public Review
section.para: This section tracks major changes made to this specification compared to the Committee Specification Draft 03 &previous-loc;/&name;-&pstage;.pdf. The third Public Review took place from 28 June 2024 until 27 July 2024.

listitem.para: The sameAs object has been added as property of etymonLanguage and etymonType (GitHub issue 140).
The translation property of etymon has been removed (GitHub issue 139).
The XSD schema has been updated to accept entries, senses and collocate markers without an id attribute. (GitHub issue 135).
